name: code-in-folder
title: Code in Folder
description: Create a dated folder in a configurable base directory with YEAR/MM-DD/TITLE structure and open in your preferred code editor
author: benzipperer

commands.name: code-in-folder
commands.title: Code in Folder
commands.subtitle: Create and open a dated project folder
commands.description: Creates a folder with YEAR/MM-DD/TITLE structure in your configured base directory and opens it in your preferred code editor

preferences.name: basePath
preferences.title: Base Directory Path
preferences.description: The base directory where folders will be created (e.g., ~/playground)

preferences.name: programName
preferences.title: Editor Program Name
preferences.description: The name of the program to open folders with (e.g., 'code' for VS Code, 'positron' for Positron)

preferences.name: addYearToPath
preferences.title: Add Year to Path
preferences.label: Include year subdirectory in path
preferences.description: When enabled, creates folders in YEAR/MM-DD/TITLE structure. When disabled, uses MM-DD/TITLE or just TITLE structure.

preferences.name: addMonthDayToPath
preferences.title: Add Month-Day to Path
preferences.label: Include month-day subdirectory in path
preferences.description: When enabled, creates folders with MM-DD subdirectory. When disabled with year enabled, uses YEAR/TITLE structure.

preferences.name: sanitizePathName
preferences.title: Sanitize Path Name
preferences.label: Convert title to snake_case
preferences.description: When enabled, converts the title to lowercase snake_case and removes special characters. When disabled, uses the title as-is.

preferences.name: truncatePathName
preferences.title: Truncate Path Name
preferences.label: Limit title length
preferences.description: When enabled, limits the title to 50 characters or 10 words. When disabled, uses the full title.
